metadata.name: GOAT Life #1
metadata.description: This NFT is your ticket to the GOAT Life, an exclusive club, where the Greatest Of All Time’s will gather & graze the grasses of crypto, collectibles, fantasy games, NFTs, VR & the metaverse…now and into the future.  This inaugural GOAT Life NFT collection is a set of 10k unique ERC-721 tokens living on the Ethereum Blockchain inspired by some of the greatest athletes, entertainers, and heroes of all time
